comments_since_last_sample.body: Great make over! I use command strips and fabric to create accent walls, etc. Matching - or not - bedskirt to better hide the games or put some games on display.

The only thing I would have tried, would maybe be to make a custom desk/surface/TV surface into one furniture. I dont't know if it would have work with her space, but I think it would have tied the desk with the rest of the living room in an another fashion. Either way, the accent wall with the wallpaper was a really good choice ! 😍

this one just doesn't work for me at all. there is still no separation of space. visually or actually. a divider between the bed and living room maybe? I dunno it seems like you just fluffed up what was already there without giving her any real solutions like "when I'm in my bed I feel like I'm in the kitchen" she said in the beginning. I usually love your makeovers but this one not so much.
